comment: I was unknowingly switched into his class at the beginning of the semester, and that was the biggest blessing in disguise! I do not think I would've succeeded as well in this course with out having him. Grades assignments very lighty, only weekly discussion posts and one big assignment at the end (3k word short story). Take take take!
Awesome teacher would recommend!
I took this as an online class, mainly just weekly discussions and one big short story paper due at the end of the semester! The professor had clear grading criteria and gives good feedback!

He is the best professor. The assignments assigned are mostly Discussion posts that would require a whole week to complete and don't worry, they aren't hard to do. I would 100% recommend you to take him.
very easy, one small group project, and not to many big assignments.

Loved his class. The entire class is basically a giant participation grade so you need to actively try to get under an A. Weekly discussion posts, a short story paper (3.5k words) which is due at the end of the semester, and other large "research" papers which are just setting up for the short story. Also a final group project which was easy. 10/10

Super chill teacher! Easiest English class I've EVER taken by far consists of weekly modules, few essays, no tests at all. He is very social with his class in a friendly way which I enjoyed. I've learned a lot about writing through his class he made me really love English.

Best ENGL class ever! I took him freshman year and it was the best and easiest class i've had yet. I definitely recommend this class for ENGL. Also, dont forget to bring your notebook to recieve credit and go to class and you will be fine!

A great teacher who cares about his students. Gives a discussion post each week to help with the final project and they are fairly simple and not time consuming. Let us choose deadlines for our final project.

Professor Smithwick makes it very easy for everyone to get an high A, All it takes is literally doing the work and coming to class Don't hesitate on choosing him. If he taught every English class I need for my major I would 100% take him for every single one. He takes attendance, discussion post once a week and essay assignments every few weeks.

Professor Smithwick truly cares about his students. He has amazing lectures and is very funny and entertaining. He's very understanding and grades lightly. There's usually only one discussion post a week with the occasional assignment. I would 100% take him again.

you will have a discussion post to do for homework every week. he is an extremely relaxed grader and gives you a lot of free reign on your papers. class is also fun. he does take attendance so make sure you are there although I do not think it counts against you. he gave us one book to read that we did not even finish. great professor.

He was awesome! He taught the curriculum and made into something helpful you can use in the real world. 2 manageable papers, weekly journal entries, and class activities. He highly encourages group discussions/participation, so you can't be shy in this class. Honestly best English professor I ever had!!
Best language arts teacher. Fried or sober, I loved his class. Great professor and great person to talk to. Class was very fun and you have fun while also becoming a better writer at that.

Great teacher! He made class so easy to follow along, does not waste your time. You have weekly one page writings but are super easy and straightforward. He cares about you and gives you good feedback. Over all his class was super easy. There is no way for you to fail this class.

This class was my favorite fall semester. He makes this class as easy as possible. All there was to it were weekly journal prompts, an in class assignment (which were usually very easy), and essays which he gives plenty of time to work on. He's a great teacher :)
Super cool guy and good at teaching. Class is fun and engaging and it is clear he really cares about his students. Please take this mans class.

he will bring up topics that don't relate at all to what you're learning and makes it a weird environment if you have LGBTQIA, women rights probably not the vibe. Journals are chill but some of the prompts kinda wack, thats about it though.

As someone that has never enjoyed an English class, Brody Smithwick is the reason English 1102 was my favorite class this semester. If you have the chance, TAKE HIS CLASS. He's a great guy that makes learning enjoyable. 10/10 class, 10/10 professor.

Brody Smithwick was great at delivering boring topics in an interesting way. He gave us creative freedom, and made research enjoyable. He was very approachable, and was always willing to help if we got stuck on parts of our assignments. He was funny, understanding, and created an environment that promoted growth, participation, learning, and fun.
Highly recommend. Assignments are easy and hes a very laid back guy.
great professor great class 10/10
He is a very good teacher and listens to his students' input.

Professor Smithwick, is one of the best Professors I have ever have. His classes were amazing, with random group projects at the moment of class to create stories or peer review of your own short story. You need to write a short story through out the semester and he gives amazing feedback on how to do it properly. Research is necessary but easy.
If you're looking for an amazing professor for  eng 1101 or 1102, this is your best choice. Made class hella fun and simple. Passed with an A both semesters
Great Professor, I had him for 1101 and 1102 and got As in both. If you do the work you're bound to succeed. He is very communicative and helpful!

If you're taking 1101 or 1102- trust me, take it with Brody. He's an awesome guy, not super strict on rubrics and grading, allows for creative freedom, and is honestly the coolest teacher I've had at KSU. 

If you have the chance- TAKE THIS CLASS!
This is one of the best teachers I have had here. He cares about what he is teaching and makes everything really simple, fun, and easy to do. This is an easy A if you do work.
Awesome teacher who cares about his students and his class is also very easy.

Mr. Smithwick is a great teacher! He is very lenient with essay grading and is very helpful. There are only four big grades for the class and some discussions and it's very easy and straight to the point. This was the class I never had to worry about and it is almost impossible to get anything lower than a B. 10/10
10/10 recommend this class. As long as you complete the graded assignments and put in effort in the essays you will have an A in the class. He is also a very understanding and reasonable teacher.
Very understanding and communicative. Awesome Professor!

Brody is definitely a gift from god. I have always hated english, but I looked forward to his class every week. Every class was always fun and I definitely learned a lot. It may seem like its a lot of assignments, but he is always there to help you out with them. If you ever get the chance to take his class you definitely should!!

Brody is seriously the best English professor at KSU! He cares so much about his students and really connects with them! He is very clear with his grading instructions and he will even push dates back depending on what the students have going on. He always gives class days to start papers. He does not give homework either!  Hes awesome

Brody is an overall great person. He genuinely cares about his students and the progression of them becoming better writers. Alongside this, he gives incredible feedback about papers. Also, he's very easy to approach about an issue with writing and will help you along the way to overcome it. Definitely take his class if possible.

Brody is such a great professor and really cares about his students. He is easy to communicate with and gives great feedback on essays. There are discussion posts that are due weekly for his class. Overall, great experience and classroom environment.

He's a great professor! The class was very fun and entertaining. Very easy to communicate with. He allows students to have inputs on assignments or projects. No test in this class. Many easy discussion posts. Overall great classroom environment. Allows students to have work days inside the classroom when working on papers or projects!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria
